```
cd k8s-specs

git pull

minikube start --vm-driver=virtualbox

minikube addons enable ingress

kubectl config current-context  
```

```
IMG=vfarcic/go-demo-2

TAG=1.0

cat ns/go-demo-2.yml \
 | sed -e \
    "s@image: $IMG@image: $IMG:$TAG@g" \
    | kubectl create -f - 
```

```
kubectl create ns testing

kubectl get ns  
```

```
NAME          STATUS    AGE
default       Active    5m
kube-public   Active    5m
kube-system   Active    5m
testing       Active    3s
```

```
kubectl config set-context testing \
 --namespace testing \
    --cluster minikube \
    --user minikube  
```

```
...
contexts:
- context:
 cluster: minikube
 user: minikube
 name: minikube
- context:
 cluster: minikube
 Namespace: testing
 user: minikube
 name: testing
...  
```

```
TAG=2.0

DOM=go-demo-2.com

cat ns/go-demo-2.yml \
    | sed -e \
    "s@image: $IMG@image: $IMG:$TAG@g" \
    | sed -e \
    "s@host: $DOM@host: $TAG\.$DOM@g" \
    | kubectl create -f -  
```

```
kubectl config use-context minikube

kubectl run test --image=alpine \
 --restart=Never sleep 10000
```

```
NAME READY STATUS  RESTARTS AGE
test 1/1   Running 0        10m  
```

```
kubectl exec -it test \
    -- apk add -U curl  
```

```
kubectl delete ns testing

kubectl -n testing get all  
```
